text.div:
Packaged Medicinal Product

This value set provide an example of possible codes representing concepts that may be associated to Packaged Medicinal Products. It is envisioned that IDMP PCID will be used in the next future.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.9.6.1.5
    CodeDisplay
    023108184AMOXICILLINA DOC '1000 MG COMPRESSE' 12 COMPRESSE
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/ndc
    CodeDisplay
    50436-3129-1'Amoxicillin and Clavulanate Potassium 875 mg/1, 125 mg/1 20 TABLET, FILM COATED in 1 BOTTLE
